com.here.android.mpa.electronic_horizon

Class Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.electronic_horizon.Link

  • public final class Link
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the smallest entity of a road segment. The path of a PathTree is defined by it's containing links.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Link.Direction
      Determines which Link.Direction of the link is part of the current path.

    • Constructor Summary

      Returns the predicted Link.Direction on this link.

      Returns the distance from the beginning of the PathTree that contains this link to the end of the link.

      Returns the unique identifier of the Link.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Link

        public Link(long id,
            Link.Direction direction,
            int startOffsetCentimeters,
            int endOffsetCentimeters)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the Link.
        direction - The Link.Direction of movement.
        startOffsetCentimeters - The distance in centimeters from the logical beginning of the path.
        endOffsetCentimeters - The distance from beginning of path to end of link in centimeters.
